---
title: "How to obtain data"
output: html_notebook
---

There are basically two ways of obtaining data: Experiments and Surveys

| Primary statistical survey                         | Secondary statistical survey                                       | Tertiary statistical survey                                           |
|----------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Collection of data specifically for current issues | Use of existing original data for new questions                    | Use of already existing, compressed data for new questions            |
| E.g. Conducting a survey                           | E.g. Compilation of original data form stat. yearbooks or websites | E.g. Compilation of mean values form stat. yearbooks or from websites |
